## Catalog Description

Semester course; 3 lecture hours. 3 credits. Prerequisite: CMSC 302 or the equivalent with a grade of C or better. Complexity classes, grammars, automata, formal languages, Turing machines, computability.


## Restrictions; any pre- or co-requisities
 
CMSC 302 or the equivalent with a grade of C or better.

## Description

Complexity classes, grammars, automata, formal languages, Turing machines, computability.
